name: Diceroll Cavefight
description:
Summary

You are a living dice, with a random roll cast a magic onto yourself. Unlike many, the only bad outcome is the neutral no effect. If you roll 1 to 3, you heal in an instant; if 4, a speed increase; 5 give you more strength; no effect if landed on 6. Everytime you roll, the speed and strength returns to normal. You have a roll attack as well, which don't trigger the magic.

Now to today, you want to take a shortcut through a super small cave, when a shady figure was inside, he can shoot fire, summon non-dice entities, and let out a soundless beam. He look's like he don't want any exposers alive, looks like it's time to battle!

This game is for the GMTK(Game Maker's Toolkit) Game Jam 2022 for the theme Roll of the Dice. I made this for one and a half days(37 hours for hour measurer) because of unfortunate timezone (starts at 1.00 AM and ends at 3.00 AM).

Control

W / Up Arrow - Move Up

A  / Left Arrow - Move Left

S  / Down Arrow - Move Down

D / Right Arrow - Move Right

X / Left Click - Circle Roll Attack

C / Right Click - Dash Roll Attack + Status Effect

Hint: hit the blue attack
